result.title: DP SOLUTION NEEDED!!
result.content: You have a string of length 10^5 which is a binary representation of a number.The string has no leading zeros like 11001 represent the number 25. We have to represent it as sum of numbers of the form of 2^x or -2^x (x>=0) . Find the minimum number of numbers needed to do so. Please highlight the states you use and the transitions when replying !
